WYSIWYM.model
Class TemplateAnchor

java.lang.Object
  WYSIWYM.model.Anchor
      WYSIWYM.model.TemplateAnchor

public class TemplateAnchor
extends Anchor

TemplateAnchor is an anchor for the templates used in creating new lexicon entries

Version:
1.1 04-04-2007, 1.5 11-2008
Author:
Feikje Hielkema
